review_discussion.author: proux01
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
Lemma divrNN x y : (- x) / (- y) = x / y.
```
(as everywhere else in the code of the library)

review_discussion.author: proux01
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
Lemma divrN x y : x / (- y) = - (x / y).
```
